item.title: Surprisingly tough Tennessee election reveals House GOP has base problem
item.description: A hard-fought victory in once-safe Republican territory came as polls show conservative support on the wane for GOP congressional majorities.

item.title: How George Soros changed criminal justice in America
item.description: The liberal funder has spent tens of millions of dollars swinging dozens of district attorney races, drawing a backlash from the right.

item.title: Republican wins special election in Trump country, as Democrat gains ground
item.description: The race in Tennessee’s ruby-red 7th Congressional District became more competitive than initially expected.
